meaningMnemonic: A <radical>flowers</radical> <radical>fang</radical> is the bud that comes out of the ground. It's like a little fang, coming from the earth, and it will become a flower someday. This is a little <kanji>sprout</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: When the <kanji>sprout</kanji> gets out of the ground and opens up, instead of a flower there is a human-looking <reading>目</reading> (め), looking right at you.
